about_the_game:
Explore Fractals in Virtual Reality. Learn about Fractals and adjust parameters to see the how fractals work. Enjoy the psychedelic shapes that mathematics has to offer. Meditative soundtrack included ~

Update: Rewritten in Unreal engine 4
detailed_description:
Unreal Engine Rewrite

Greetings! I'm pleased to announce that Emergence has been rewritten in Unreal Engine 4.25 and now supports Valve Index and Oculus. Rewriting the application in Unreal engine took considerable effort, but I feel that it was well worth the performance boost. If you're operating without a VR headset, check the community page for a guide on how to bring up the Desktop Overlay interface. Kind Regards, ~W


About the Software

Explore Fractals in Virtual Reality. Learn about Fractals and adjust parameters to see the how fractals work. Enjoy the psychedelic shapes that mathematics has to offer. Meditative soundtrack included ~ Update: Rewritten in Unreal engine 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Fractal Explorer and editor for VR
